name: Erick Zúñiga
bio: Erick Zúñiga, the agile full back from Costa Rica, is known for his relentless stamina and exceptional crossing ability. With a blend of tactical intelligence and true passion for football, he fearlessly engages in both defensive duties and offensive support, making him a vital player on the pitch. His roots in the lush landscapes of San José deeply influence his playing style, embodying the spirit of Tierra Alta FC.
